resources.string: If you found a bug, I am really sorry. I will do my best to make this app better. In the meantime, you can decide how to reach me to report the bug you found. Do you want to use Telegram or Email?
Hello Luca, There is a bug in your app. Let me quickly describe it to you.
You have a feature suggestion? Sure, send it to me.
I have a very nice idea. Hear me out:
Look, I found an app with quotes and wisdom. Download it here: https://github.com/Lijukay/Qwotable

Do you have Feedback for my application? You can easily write your opinion to me by choosing Telegram or Email. Please do not just write \"I (do not) like your app.\" Be creative. Tell me what you (do not) like.
Hello,\n\nListen to the melodie of my feedback:

Qwotable is a free Android application, made by me, Luca. Qwotable does not collect any data and never will. Every interaction with me is selectable. I am offering the possibility of sending me mails, which includes bugs, features and/or feedback. When the conversation with the user has ended, I will delete the contact data and the conversation due to the security of data. I may change the Privacy Policy. Every change is effective immediately. An information of the change of the Privacy Policy can be found on the changelog Effective December 11, 2022
For my application, I used some things that are not mine: Lottie Animations However, because the files are all signed with the Lottie Simple License I have the chance to not mention the creator.
Hey, cool that you are here. Qwotable has a Wiki-Website. How about having a look?
In order to update this application, this app needs the permission to read and write storage
A newer version of this app is available. Go to settings, click on Updater and install the latest update to get the latest bug fixes and features.
A newer beta version of this app is available. Go to settings, click on Updater and install the latest beta update to get the latest bug fixes and features to test.

Quotes are passages from books, games and movies as well as from songs or public speeches. Usually, the author and the name of the book/movie/song/game is mentioned in the credits. In this app it looks like this:
Horse: \"Life is difficult, but you are loved.\"
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse
Here you can see the quote, the author and (in this case) the movie where the quote can be found.

In this app, wisdoms are stories/tales that is teaching you of something. It is not always clear, what the wisdom is teaching you. Usually, the author, as well as the book/game/movie is mentioned in the credits. In this app it looks like this:
Here you can see the quote, the author and (in this case) the game where the wisdom can be found.
Hey,\n\nThis Qwotable is not in the app:
You found a Qwotable that is not in this app yet? You can send it to me if you want to.

This app uses some permissions. This page will explain to you why my app needs these permissions. Read and write storage: Qwotable needs to be able to read and write to the storage in order to save and install app updates on the device. No data is written to storage. Full Internet Access: This permission allows my app to get the quotes from my file on the Internet. No data is collected from me. Install unknown packages: This permission allows my app to install the update.
Not available yet. Wait for an update to use this featur
Your System-language currently is not supported. The language is set to English.\nSupported languages: English, German, French
‚Ä¶ to Qwotable. In the following, you will see features and instructions of Qwotable.
Qwotable is an ad free application for you to relax and focuse on Qwotable\'s content!
Qwotable\'s content are quotes and wisdom. It is made for you to relax and fill your brain with deep sentences.
Qwotable has a lot of quotable stuff that will be updated from time to time. You will recognize it, because the newer the Qwotable, the more on the top it will be!
Besides the quotes and wisdom pages, Qwotable offers a page with the quotes and wisdom, based on the author. You simply have to tap on the authors name to get there!
Get the latest information of Qwotable in the Information page. For that, all you need to do is to swipe down to the bottom of the Homepage and click on "Information"
Simply click on the button below on or swipe to go on.
Tap the button below to use Qwotable

There was an error getting the Qwotables from the file online. Have a look at the information\'s page. If there isn\'t already an entry about this error, feel free to contact me. As soon as I see the issue, I will add an information and take care to fix it as soon as possible!
Boy: \"What is the bravest thing you\'ve ever said?\"\nHorse: \"Help. Asking for help isn\'t giving up, it is refusing to give up.\"
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse
Connect to the internet to see quotes
Connect to the internet to see wisdom
Error while receiving the Qwotables. If there isn\'t already an information on the information-page, feel free to contact me.
You want to get beta updates
You don\'t want to get beta updates
You found a bug? Click here to send it to me
